pull.title: bitcoin-tx: Reject non-integral and out of range int strings
pull.body:
Seems odd to silently accept arbitrary strings that don't even represent integral values.

Fix that.

rename.from: bitcoin-tx: Reject non-integral and out of range sequence ids

comments.body: It is very un-us to throw an exception for a parse error here. But as this is local to `bitcoin-tx` where this is explicitly caught I think it's acceptable.
